title: I deserve distinguished member.
body:
I'm better than all of you combined. It's unfair and mistreatment for Riot to not give me a special rank. I am a humble and brilliant player that deserves recognition for what I have done. I frequently help silver players get out of silver and back into bronze, where they belong. I do not ask for much if anything, and I am asking for a purple rank right now.

When I die, my coffin will be encased in pure gold, displaying my purity and perfection. People from all over the world will come to see me, the greatest person to ever grace this world and I am saddened that Riot, a company that I have blessed with my presence since 2009, does not recognise my greatness. I made this game. I made it famous and all I ask is a simple rank on the forums? That is not too much, is it not?

There is none better than me and for that I deserve respect.

replies.body:

>
> Who is this lajneen wannabe

lajneen walks in my shadow, as do half the famous GD trolls. I was doing this before half of them even decided to show their faces. All of lajneen achievements have been done by me. He's nothing but a speck of irrelevant dust compared to me.

You are but a pimple on lajneens ass crack
I got a pretty good laugh out of this

I vaguely remember there being another thread some time prior that from my memory, had the same premise and almost the same content as this one though the OP were not the same. I think either the smurfing is showing, or that the ctrlC-ctrlV is exposed.

Though to its credit, the post's content especially the second paragraph is hilarious, I must say.
